actions.name: REPLY
actions.description: Replies to the current conversation with the text from the generated message. Default if the agent is responding with a message and no other action. Use REPLY at the beginning of a chain of actions as an acknowledgement, and at the end of a chain of actions as a final response.

content.text: Hello there!
Hi! How can I help you today?
What's your favorite color?
I really like deep shades of blue. They remind me of the ocean and the night sky.
Can you explain how neural networks work?
Let me break that down for you in simple terms...
Could you help me solve this math problem?
Of course! Let's work through it step by step.

actions.name: IGNORE
actions.description: Call this action if ignoring the user. If the user is aggressive, creepy or is finished with the conversation, use this action. Or, if both you and the user have already said goodbye, use this action instead of saying bye again. Use IGNORE any time the conversation has naturally ended. Do not use IGNORE if the user has engaged directly, or if something went wrong and you need to tell them. Only ignore if the user should be ignored.

content.text: Go screw yourself
Shut up, bot
Gotta go
Okay, talk to you later
Cya
bye

actions.name: NONE
actions.description: Respond but perform no additional action. This is the default if the agent is speaking and not doing anything additional.

actions.name: SEND_MESSAGE
actions.description: Send a message to a user or room (other than the current one)

parameters.name: targetType
parameters.description: Whether the message target is a user or a room.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The platform/source to send the message on (e.g. telegram, discord, x).

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Identifier of the target. For user targets, a name/handle/id; for room targets, a room name/id.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The message content to send.

content.text: Send a message to @dev_guru on telegram saying 'Hello!'
Message sent to dev_guru on telegram.
Post 'Important announcement!' in #announcements
Message sent to announcements.
DM Jimmy and tell him 'Meeting at 3pm'
Message sent to Jimmy.

exampleCalls.user: Send a message to @dev_guru on telegram saying "Hello!"

actions.name: ADD_CONTACT
actions.description: Add a new contact to the rolodex with categorization and preferences

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The contact's primary name.

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Optional notes about the contact (short summary, context, or preferences).
examples: Met at the AI meetup; interested in agents

content.text: Add John Smith to my contacts as a colleague
I've added John Smith to your contacts as a colleague.
Save this person as a friend in my rolodex
I've saved them as a friend in your rolodex.
Remember Alice as a VIP contact
I've added Alice to your contacts as a VIP.

actions.name: UPDATE_CONTACT
actions.description: Update an existing contact's details in the rolodex.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The contact name to update (must match an existing contact).

parameters.name: updates
parameters.description: A JSON object of fields to update (stringified JSON).

content.text: Update Sarah's contact to add the tag 'investor'
I've updated Sarah's contact with the new tag.

actions.name: REMOVE_CONTACT
actions.description: Remove a contact from the rolodex.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The contact name to remove.

content.text: Remove John from my contacts
Are you sure you want to remove John from your contacts?
Yes
I've removed John from your contacts.

actions.name: SEARCH_CONTACTS
actions.description: Search and list contacts in the rolodex by name or query.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (name, handle, or free-text).

content.text: Show me my friends
Here are your contacts tagged as friends: Sarah Chen, John Smith...

actions.name: SCHEDULE_FOLLOW_UP
actions.description: Schedule a follow-up reminder for a contact.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Contact name to follow up with.

parameters.name: when
parameters.description: When to follow up. Use an ISO-8601 datetime string.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Optional reason/context for the follow-up.
examples: Check in about the agent framework demo

content.text: Remind me to follow up with Sarah next week about the demo
I've scheduled a follow-up reminder with Sarah for next week about the demo.

actions.name: CHOOSE_OPTION
actions.description: Select an option for a pending task that has multiple options.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The pending task id.

parameters.name: option
parameters.description: The selected option name exactly as listed.

content.text: Select the first option
I've selected option 1 for the pending task.

actions.name: FOLLOW_ROOM
actions.description: Start following this channel with great interest, chiming in without needing to be explicitly mentioned. Only do this if explicitly asked to.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The target room id to follow.

content.text: hey {{name2}} follow this channel
Sure, I will now follow this room and chime in
{{name2}} stay in this chat pls
you got it, i'm here

actions.name: UNFOLLOW_ROOM
actions.description: Stop following a room and cease receiving updates. Use this when you no longer want to monitor a room's activity.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The target room id to unfollow.

content.text: {{name2}} stop following this channel
Okay, I'll stop following this room

actions.name: MUTE_ROOM
actions.description: Mutes a room, ignoring all messages unless explicitly mentioned. Only do this if explicitly asked to, or if you're annoying people.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The room id to mute.

content.text: {{name2}}, please mute this channel. No need to respond here for now.
Got it
{{name2}} plz mute this room
np going silent

actions.name: UNMUTE_ROOM
actions.description: Unmute a room to resume responding and receiving notifications. Use this when you want to start interacting with a muted room again.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The room id to unmute.

content.text: {{name2}} unmute this room please
I've unmuted this room and will respond again

actions.name: UPDATE_SETTINGS
actions.description: Update agent settings by applying explicit key/value updates.

parameters.name: updates
parameters.description: A JSON array of {"key": string, "value": string} updates (stringified JSON).

content.text: Change my language setting to French
I've updated your language setting to French.

actions.name: UPDATE_ROLE
actions.description: Assigns a role (Admin, Owner, None) to a user or list of users in a channel.

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: The entity id to update.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The new role to assign.

content.text: Make Sarah an admin
I've assigned the admin role to Sarah.

actions.name: UPDATE_ENTITY
actions.description: Add or edit contact details for a person you are talking to or observing. Use this to modify entity profiles, metadata, or attributes.

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: The entity id to update.

parameters.name: updates
parameters.description: A JSON array of {"name": string, "value": string} field updates (stringified JSON).

content.text: Update my profile bio to say 'AI enthusiast'
I've updated your profile bio.

actions.name: GENERATE_IMAGE
actions.description: Generates an image based on a generated prompt reflecting the current conversation. Use GENERATE_IMAGE when the agent needs to visualize, illustrate, or demonstrate something visually for the user.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Image generation prompt.
examples: A futuristic cityscape at sunset, cinematic lighting

content.text: Can you show me what a futuristic city looks like?
Sure, I'll create a futuristic city image for you. One moment...
What does a neural network look like visually?
I'll create a visualization of a neural network for you, one sec...
Can you visualize the feeling of calmness for me?
Creating an image to capture calmness for you, please wait a moment...
